snippet.title: Wheels! - Gameplay
snippet.description:
Part of my Obscure First Person Shooters series: https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL2BBA1AB1CF53EEAC

Gameplay footage from Wheels! (1998), a "power wheelchair simulation training software." In other words, a first person shooter where you, the wheelchair-bound protagonist, enter a school to cream the evil clowns and mad robots with your pies. There is no strafing. Also, it's built on Bungie's Marathon engine.

Note: After quickly getting rocked in the first level, I load a save game that's near the end of the second level where I proceed to complete it and the subsequent third level, thus beating the entire game. Don't watch if you don't want to spoil the ending!

For reference purposes: http://www.rjcooper.com/wheels/
